Special Powers
SALVAGE: FREE: If Corsair occupies or is adjacent to hindering terrain, roll a d6 and place it on this card [MAX 1]. // If Corsair has a die on this card, he modifies by +1 the listed combat value(s) matching the number on the die.// When he makes an attack, after resolutions remove the die. 3-4: Attack. 5: Damage. 6: Attack and Damage.
